# helpers.totatives { #pyLHD.helpers.totatives }

`helpers.totatives(N)`

Generate all positive integers less than and coprime to N from [1,N)

## Parameters

| Name   | Type   | Description                     | Default    |
|--------|--------|---------------------------------|------------|
| `N`    | int    | The number to find coprimes for | _required_ |

## Returns

| Type        | Description                                                  |
|-------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
| List\[int\] | List[int]: A list of integers in [1,N) that are coprime to N |

## Examples



```{python}
import pyLHD
pyLHD.totatives(11)
```
